## Description {#details}

Functions in this group relate to indirect functions.

Functions in this group expect <a href="/docs/api/groups/llvmcsupporttypes/#ga113ce952344691b8304a43a314f8be17">LLVMValueRef</a> instances that correspond to <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/globalifunc">llvm::GlobalIFunc</a> instances.

<SectionDefinition>

### LLVMAddGlobalIFunc() {#gaa42647f1f16fb0c86b1700979fdac1ae}

### LLVMGetNamedGlobalIFunc() {#ga55ecbf56e0d2650246f684025b56e2d5}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>LLVMValueRef LLVMGetNamedGlobalIFunc (<a href="/docs/api/groups/llvmcsupporttypes/#gad1d1bb5f901c903a0cf09c5a053c9c56">LLVMModuleRef</a> M, <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/aarch64/aarch64promoteconstant-cpp/#a90f8350fecae261c25be85d38b451bff">const</a> char &#42; Name, size&#95;t NameLen)</>}>
Obtain a GlobalIFunc value from a Module by its name.

The returned value corresponds to a <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/globalifunc">llvm::GlobalIFunc</a> value.

### LLVMGetNextGlobalIFunc() {#ga26f3e0f1fb15709537936476b44da768}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>LLVMValueRef LLVMGetNextGlobalIFunc (<a href="/docs/api/groups/llvmcsupporttypes/#ga113ce952344691b8304a43a314f8be17">LLVMValueRef</a> IFunc)</>}>
Advance a GlobalIFunc iterator to the next GlobalIFunc.

Returns NULL if the iterator was already at the end and there are no more global aliases.

Declaration at line <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm-c/core-h/#l03106">3106</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm-c/core-h">Core.h</a>, definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/ir/core-cpp/#l02711">2711</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/ir/core-cpp">Core.cpp</a>.
</MemberDefinition>

### LLVMGetPreviousGlobalIFunc() {#gae19214b102baae71f805de3544b30247}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>LLVMValueRef LLVMGetPreviousGlobalIFunc (<a href="/docs/api/groups/llvmcsupporttypes/#ga113ce952344691b8304a43a314f8be17">LLVMValueRef</a> IFunc)</>}>
Decrement a GlobalIFunc iterator to the previous GlobalIFunc.

Returns NULL if the iterator was already at the beginning and there are no previous global aliases.

Declaration at line <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm-c/core-h/#l03114">3114</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm-c/core-h">Core.h</a>, definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/ir/core-cpp/#l02719">2719</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/ir/core-cpp">Core.cpp</a>.

### LLVMRemoveGlobalIFunc() {#ga1854c42aa0d29c5b26fe3f277041de29}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>void LLVMRemoveGlobalIFunc (<a href="/docs/api/groups/llvmcsupporttypes/#ga113ce952344691b8304a43a314f8be17">LLVMValueRef</a> IFunc)</>}>
Remove a global indirect function from its parent module.

This unlinks the global indirect function from its containing module but keeps it alive.


<SectionUser title="See Also">
<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/globalifunc/#a5892574848285e3ff045d123520a165a">llvm::GlobalIFunc::removeFromParent()</a>
</SectionUser>

</MemberDefinition>
